words.imagePrompt: A team of players racing against a giant clock
words.clue: A TEAM (sounds like 'ti') racing against time, saying 'PO!' as they run. TIEMPO = TEAM + PO

words.imagePrompt: A purse owner showing ID to enter a club
words.clue: A PURSE OWNER (sounds like 'persona') showing ID to prove they're a PERSON. PERSONA = PURSE + OWNER

words.imagePrompt: A crying child saying 'I know, I know' while looking at a calendar
words.clue: The kid cries 'AÑO!' (sounds like 'I know!') while looking at how many YEARS have passed. AÑO sounds just like I KNOW

words.imagePrompt: A deer jumping over a rising sun
words.clue: A DEER ('día' sounds like 'deer') jumps over the rising sun to start a new DAY. DÍA sounds just like DEER

words.imagePrompt: A confused person opening a box saying 'What's so special?'
words.clue: Looking at this THING in the box saying 'What's SO special?' COSA = CO + SA (sounds like 'so')

words.imagePrompt: A video game character with multiple hearts collecting extra lives
words.clue: A VIDEO game (VI-da) character collecting extra LIVES. VIDA = VIDEO + DA

words.imagePrompt: Monday written on a globe-shaped calendar
words.clue: It's MON-day (MUN sounds like 'Mon') in the whole WORLD. MUNDO = MONDAY without the 'ay'

words.imagePrompt: A farmer shaping crops into geometric patterns
words.clue: A FARMER (FOR-ma) giving FORM to the crops. FORMA = FARMER without the 'er'

words.imagePrompt: A castle made of playing cards
words.clue: A CASTLE (CA-sa) made of cards is still a HOUSE. CASA = CASTLE without 'tle'

words.imagePrompt: A party where everyone has one piece of a puzzle
words.clue: At this PARTY (PARTE), everyone has their PART of the puzzle. PARTE = PARTY without the 'y'
